definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Le 7:18 foul thing, refuse, but only as term. techn. of unclean sacrificial flesh;—it is ´[[פ]] if eaten on third day Le 7:18 (P), Le 19:7 (H); cf. ´[[בְּשַׂר פ]] Ez Eze 4:14 (undefined); pl. [[מְרַק פִּגֻּלִים]] Is 65:4 broth of refuse things (Kt [[פרק]]), RS:Sem i. 325, 2nd ed. 343 thinks of flesh with the blood; Du:ad loc. of mice and other unclean animals.
